meanings.sent1: The group of theoreticians gathered to discuss their latest theories.
meanings.sent2: Many theoreticians enjoy exploring new ideas and concepts.
meanings.sent3: The theoreticians joked that they could theorize about anything, even the color of the sky.
meanings.sent4: Her mind worked like a team of theoreticians, constantly creating and refining theories.
meanings.sent5: The room buzzed with excitement as the theoreticians debated the best approach to their research.

meanings.definition: Theoreticians: Those who engage in theoretical study or speculation.
meanings.sent1: The group of theoreticians met regularly to discuss their latest findings.
meanings.sent2: She admired the dedication of theoreticians who spent hours pondering abstract concepts.
meanings.sent3: The theoreticians playfully argued about the most outlandish theories they could come up with.
meanings.sent4: His mind was a playground for theoreticians, exploring the boundaries of what could be imagined.
meanings.sent5: The room echoed with the voices of theoreticians sharing their insights and hypotheses.
